meaning_str.bing:
n. 娱乐；娱乐活动；招待；款待
网络. 休闲娱乐；娱乐表演；娱乐性

娱乐；娱乐活动；招待；款待
休闲娱乐；娱乐表演；娱乐性

消遣；娱乐；文娱节目；休闲活动；娱乐业；娱乐行业；接待；款待；宴请；招待会

1.en: "One of my career goals was to work abroad, and I also love to be in entertainment, " she said.
1.cn: 我的职业目标之一是到国外工作，我也很喜欢娱乐界。

2.en: I believe that this news Click here to read the amount of no less than any of certain entertainment gossip.
2.cn: 我相信，这条新闻的点击阅读量，一定不亚于任何一条娱乐八卦新闻。

3.en: And of course, good education has got to be good entertainment.
3.cn: 当然，好的教育就是一种好的娱乐。

0.en: So you wanna watch Entertainment Tonight? Thanks.

1.en: So you guys having any luck getting rid of the entertainment center?

2.en: The show features every type of Chinese entertainment, including, of course, martial arts.
2.cn: 晚会囊括了中国各类娱乐形式，当然包括武术。

3.en: OK, what are we gonna do about this? Well, I guess we could tape Entertainment Tonight.
3.cn: 这件事我们怎么解决？我们可以把“今夜娱乐”录下来。

4.en: Wouldn't you pay good money to see these identical hands showcased in some type of a entertainment venue?
4.cn: 你愿不愿意花大钱去看手掌一模一样的两个人这种娱乐性的演出？

5.en: I wanna watch Entertainment Tonight. Tough noogies, we're watching Predators of the Serengeti.
5.cn: 我要看“今夜娱乐”。真不幸，我们要看“塞伦盖蒂野生国家公园的掠食者”。

6.en: Your monkey found a new career, in the entertainment field. That's all I know. This is unbelievable.
6.cn: 你的猴子有了新职业了，往娱乐界发展去了，我只知道这一些。真是令人难以置信。

7.en: When the Chinese aren't splashing out on the beach-holidays, they are turning to television and cinema for their entertainment.
7.cn: 当中国人不再为海滨度假挥金如土时，他们转而将观看影视作品作为娱乐方式。

8.en: Against this ever-changing landscape, millions of Chinese still observe ancient traditions and rights, once discovering new forms of leisure and entertainment.
8.cn: 华夏大地，日新月异，却有很多中国人仍遵循传统与古法，也发现了休闲娱乐的新方式。

9.en: No, it's okay. I don't have to go. I'm happy just to guide you and your ladies to suitable entertainment choices. I'm a walking brown Yelp.Com.
9.cn: 不，没事儿的，我不必去的，我很荣幸能给你和你们的女人提供合适的娱乐建议，我就是个棕色人型口碑网。

10.en: To feed this hunger for entertainment that was denied to them for decades, south of Shanghai in Zhejiang province, a massive complex has been built.
10.cn: 为满足人们对娱乐数十年来从未被满足的渴望，在上海之南的浙江省，一个巨大的综合设施早已拔地而起。

11.en: Before you go, consider this. Not only do I have a deep cycle marine battery power source which is more than capable of running our entertainment system, I also have all 61 episodes of the BBC series Red Dwarf and Fiddle Faddle.
11.cn: 等等，考虑下这个，我不但有深循环的海军陆战队电池，这能更好地支持我们的娱乐活动。我还有一共61集的BBC科幻剧《红矮星号》，还有《无聊星人》。

12.en: It also faces the television at a direct angle, allowing me to immerse myself in entertainment or game play without being subjected to conversation. As a result, I've placed it in a state of eternal dibs.
12.cn: 而且正对着电视机，我能专心看电视或者打机，不受谈话干扰。因此，我把它置于永恒状态了。
